episode_event_ch0318_80_claver/4001_1001:
Yes. I’ve changed up my look—had an outfit
makeover, one could say. What do you think?

It’s such a big change, I totally thought the
Uva Academy director was here.

Oh? The director you know must wear something
like this, then.

I’m glad to have switched up my look if it makes
me more approachable to you.
When I saw you with Nemona and the others...

I was slightly concerned that you were the only
one wearing a different-colored uniform.

So I thought the least I could do is wear an outfit
that matches yours, so you don’t feel left out.

Even if you came here from a different world,
you’re still an important student to me, Florian.

From now on, please don’t hesitate to rely on me
just as you would the Uva Academy director.
Of course! Thank you very much!
Oh, that’s right. I haven’t introduced you yet.
This is my new partner Pokémon, Sprigatito!

I plan on doing my own Treasure Hunt with him
on Pasio.

I hope we’ll all get to know each other better,
even with my new look.
Absolutely! Nice to meet you, Sprigatito!
